modName: Pink Princess Outfit Retexture plus Bodyslide
descriptionHtml:
[quote]Here I hope its Okay! [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/wink.gif[/img]

Link to unp meshes:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/5ddd9jfdivqljsu/Pink%20princess%20UNP%20Meshes%20for%20lefttounge%20.zip?dl=0[/quote][center][font=Courier New][b]Hey![/b]
something has always bothered has always bothered me about this outfit...and i'm assuming i'm not the only one...what am I taking about you ask..the god damn Hello kitty logo as well as all other logos on the outfit's! I have also darkened all of the clothing pieces...because lets be honest...wearing a bight pink jacket in Skyrim is far from immersive, even when considering my fragile standards of lore friendliness.
[/font][/center][font=Courier New][color=#980000][size=3][b]Required files[/b][/size][/color]
Any body that supports unp textures unp,uunp,Bamfta ect.
Personally I recommend Bamfta...but its up to you although if you are not using this body make sure to run body slide before use!!!
[/font][font=Courier New]
[color=#980000][size=4][b]Credits!!!
[/b][/size][/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19776819]gutris1[/url] for the skyrim conversion!
[/font][font=Courier New][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/users/3013814]ThisMalkavian[/url] for the original fnv mod!
[url=http://wtfuun.tumblr.com/post/149172499330/pink-princess-outfit-uunp-bodyslide-hdt-original]Widowpuppy[/url][/font][font=Courier New] for the bodyslide files!
[/font]Izumiko for the top! (I apologise for not creating a link for Izumiko I am currently away from home and apparently I can't link their name on my phone...)
author: Michaelspicer16
